body:
Hi Everybody,



I tried to use "Honeybee_EnergyPlus Window Shade Generator" to created a shade for a windows, I set "interiorOrExter_" to "True", but the shade is displayed on outside of room.



An other question, how to check/display the normal direction of the surface?



May I get some help from someone, how to move the shade to inside room.



Thanks advance.



Solon.
